game.name: LEVEL UP 80
game.shortDescription: LEVEL UP 80은 마법과 슈팅 메커니즘을 갖춘 액션 게임으로, 고독한 기사가 레벨 1에서 80으로 올라가 거대한 오크 군대를 물리쳐야 합니다. 다양한 주문과 무기를 활용하여 침략자로부터 평화로운 땅을 보호하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: LEVEL UP 80 is an action game with magic and shooter mechanics, where a lone knight must level up from 1 to 80 to defeat a massive orc army. Utilize various spells and weapons to protect peaceful lands from invaders.

reviewHighlights.text: Game is fun but it's glitched and i physically can't progress any tips to fix would help.
